% Positions
% id = identity for triangularisation
% chan = output audio channel
%
% cartesians
% (0,0,0) is at the centre of the Audio Lab: 1.95m and 2.35m from the inside bounding surfaces of the frame, and 1.22m from the floor.
% id	chan 	x(m)	y(m)	z(m)
